description: This file defines an interface class IEventHandler within the WPEFramework::Plugin namespace. The interface declares four pure virtual methods to handle various OCI container events, each accepting a container name and a JsonObject reference for event data.

classes.name: IEventHandler
classes.description: An interface class defining event handling callbacks for OCI container lifecycle events.

methods.name: onOCIContainerStartedEvent
methods.description: Callback invoked when an OCI container has started, with the container's name and event data.

methods.name: onOCIContainerStoppedEvent
methods.description: Callback invoked when an OCI container has stopped, with the container's name and event data.

methods.name: onOCIContainerFailureEvent
methods.description: Callback invoked when an OCI container failure occurs, with the container's name and event data.

methods.name: onOCIContainerStateChangedEvent
methods.description: Callback invoked when the OCI container's state changes, with the container's name and event data.
